title: Stop Auto Down patching ffs
body: this has happened countless times, I have internet issues once in a while, playing the game get dced for 5 seconds okay no biggie, try to get in and oh oh I've been down patched now I cant fucking log in, and ill get some kind of penalty again, now I usually just deal but seriously give players the option to say yes or no its infuriating

replies.body: Since the game is played online, there isn't any way for you to **not** patch and still be able to play. If this keeps happening over and over, it might be a sign that your network is having troubles correctly downloading the patch. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **Force Repatch** and that should do the trick!
